description:
TITLE: VP of Sponsorships / Partnerships

LOCATION: Major Metro Market Preferred

REPORTS TO: President / General Manager

ABOUT THE ROLE

Breakaway is a fast-growing music and entertainment company in search of a highly motivated Vice President of Sponsorships to lead and support in the building of relationships with brands and companies as sponsors for Breakaway’s portfolio of properties including but not limited to Breakaway Music Festival, various concerts and artists signed to Breakaway.

This role will work closely with all departments at Breakaway to ensure that all available means are made available to brands and potential sponsors in an effort to build robust and long term relationships.

Breakaway’s partnership team has worked tirelessly to develop meaningful partnerships across a multitude of verticals. From alcohol to automotive, national sponsorships to small local relationships, Breakaway strives to generate meaningful revenue while also offering a unique opportunity for brands to co-develop partnerships to ensure goals are exceeded through a relationship with Breakaway.

The individual who fills this position must not only have the ability to create meaningful relationships but also generate new and exciting opportunities for brands to engage with Breakaway beyond the “norm” - which may include mixed assets across digital marketing, out of home marketing and activation on site at events. This person must be a team player and seek to exceed expectations of their teammates.

RESPONSIBILITIES

● Directly lead the sales function and team within Breakaway, managing multiple employees, contractors and sales agencies simultaneously

● Work internally to create sellable inventory of assets for sponsorship across all Breakaway verticals (festivals, concerts, artists)

● Meet or exceed revenue goals by categories as assigned

● Develop and maintain incredibly strong relationships across brands and other

stakeholders with the appropriate decision making individuals

● Build pitches and proposals in a timely manner that are compelling and on brand for

Breakaway and the potential partner

● Support in the positioning of Breakaway properties both internally and externally

● Structure and price sponsorship opportunities that align with both internal and external

goals

● Maintain internal sales pipelines and other reporting tools on a regular basis

● Negotiate with potential partners with the best interest of both parties in mind

● Partner with finance on payment terms and other financial deliverables related to the partnership

● Draft and deliver deal memos and contracts as appropriate

● Develop a well of contacts that can be invited to attend Breakaway events

● Travel to meetings regularly to develop relationships and win business

● Travel to events regularly to host and entertain existing and potential partners

● Work closely with the Partnerships Operations team to ensure flawless execution of the

partnership across all areas of the business

REQUIREMENTS

● A team player who is highly motivated, communicates well and has a desire to participate in the larger Breakaway team culture

● Have a “rolodex” of existing relationships that can be leveraged with Breakaway’s properties

● Experience in pricing and negotiating sponsorship for other properties similar to Breakaway

● Proven track record of success opening new doors, developing relationships and closing deals

● Ability to build pitches and proposals professionally and efficiently

● Very strong communication and interpersonal skills with an emphasis on both written and

verbal communication

● Ability to have tough conversations with sponsors to ensure all parties remain on the

same page as needed

● Ability to speak about Breakaway with passion and excitement to new and prospective

partners

● Comfortable with both receiving and providing feedback to peers and management

● Ability to thrive in a fast paced environment with non traditional work hours

● Ability to work both independently and as part of a larger team

● Excellent use of software programs like Google, Microsoft, etc.

LOCATION

Major Metro Market Preferred
